name: Root Slap Rescue
description:
Fling your stretchy arm to slap away the menacing roots trying to suck your friends dry!

Controls: Tap/click and drag then release to fling your hand

Play in browser with a computer or mobile device!

Made for Global Game Jam 2023

Credits: 
Jesse Taikina-aho
NANIMOON

Music: "Darkness" from purple-planet.com
